remarks: Change bound variables of triple restricted universal quantification, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 10-May-2005.)
statement:
cbvral3v.1 $e |- ( x = w -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
cbvral3v.2 $e |- ( y = v -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
cbvral3v.3 $e |- ( z = u -> ( th <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvral3v $p |- ( A. x e. A A. y e. B A. z e. C ph <-> A. w e. A A. v e. B A. u e. C ps ) $.
$d A w $.
$d A x $.
$d B v $.
$d B w y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C u y $.
$d C v z $.
$d C w y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d ch v $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph w $.
$d ps z $.
$d th u y $.
